prompt: Hello Mr!  May I ask what you are doing on my lawn?

replies.1: I am lost and not sure where I am.
replies.2: I came here to look for treasures!

prompt: Well if you are like all the others then you must be in search of the forbidden treasure located in the Lost Souls Field.  Would that be a correct assumption?

replies.2: Rabble Rabble Rabble get out of my way.

prompt: The Lost Souls Field is located north of here, but be careful and bring a weapon with you.
How rude... Get off my lawn this instant!
